attributes.action: CREATE OFFSHORE PRISONS AND CONSIDER DISUSED OILS RIGS AS AN ALTERNATIVE PRISON
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With the current over-crowding of prisons in the U.K, we believe that offshore prisons should be built to ease the strain on the justice system instead of letting dangerous & hardened criminals back onto the streets to commit more crimes. There is also the possible use of disused oil rigs to be possibly turned into an alternative prison.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
